charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard a ferocious
Pokémon cry and found [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way to its source...
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_0300_1: I was just having a Pokémon battle with Lyra!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_0500_1:
Nemona! Don’t get sidetracked! We had a purpose,
remember?
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_0700_1:
I was having so much fun battling
with you and Jigglypuff—I got
carried away!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_0800_1:
We were trying to find out whether my partner
here is actually Jigglypuff’s ancestor...through
battle!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_0900_1: It’s a Pokémon called Scream Tail.
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_1000_1:
According to this paranormal magazine in Paldea,
it looks like a Jigglypuff from a billion years ago!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_1100_1:
I can kinda see it! It looks like a slightly more
ferocious version of a regular Jigglypuff,
don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_1300_1:
Isn’t that way before the era when Fossil Pokémon
were flourishing?
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_1400_1:
Well, the magazine might’ve been exaggerating
a little.
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_1500_1:
I’ve been so curious to know whether that story is
true, though!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_1600_1:
So I thought a battle with Lyra’s Jigglypuff might
be a good way to compare the two!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0301_1700_1:
Wouldn’t you have battled even if
they weren’t similar?
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0401_1900_1: I guess I would’ve either way... Heh!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0402_2200_1:
To be honest with you... I think I just really
wanted to have a battle!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2300_1:
Besides, whether that magazine story is true or
not...
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2400_1:
Scream Tail is apparently categorized as a
Paradox Pokémon, and it came here from a
completely different era!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2500_1:
I’m SO happy to be able to battle as a sync pair
with a Pokémon we have so much to learn about!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2600_1:
There are lots of other Pokémon on Pasio that are
full of mysteries too, like Ultra Beasts...
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2700_1:
And there are Trainers out who can fully connect
with them! I’ve gotta keep up!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2800_1:
Pokémon are still Pokémon, no matter where
they’re from...or when!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_2900_1:
I wanna work hard so I can become an amazing
sync pair with Scream Tail!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_3000_1:
I think Scream Tail is happy to be your partner
Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_3100_1:
It got to meet a Trainer who accepts it just the
way it is!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0301_3200_1:
I hope you two become a great
sync pair!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0401_3300_1:
Uh-huh! We’re totally gonna take our connection
to the next level!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0302_3400_1: You two make a ferocious sync pair!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_0402_3500_1:
Haha! Scream Tail seems to like battling too, so
I guess we’re pretty similar?
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_3600_1:
Maybe other Pokémon from a different time will
come to Pasio.
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_3700_1:
If that ever happens, I hope they’ll see us and feel
inspired to become partner Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0289_10_nemo/2301_1201_3800_1: So I’ll keep on battling with everything I have!
